graphql.query:
query CNVDataQuery($ensemblId: String!, $efoId: String!, $size: Int!) {
  disease(efoId: $efoId) {
    id
    evidences(
      ensemblIds: [$ensemblId]
      enableIndirect: true
      size: $size
      datasourceIds: ["chop_gene_level_snv"]
    ) {
      count
      rows{
       dataset
       Disease
       frequencyInOverallDataset
       frequencyInPrimaryTumors
       frequencyInRelapseTumors
       geneFullName
       geneSymbol
       geneType
       MONDO
       OncoKBCancerGene
       OncoKBOncogeneTSG
       pedcbioPedotMutationsPlotURL
       pedcbioPedotOncoprintPlotURL
       proteinEnsemblId
       proteinRefseqId
       PMTL
       totalPrimaryTumorsMutatedOverPrimaryTumorsInDataset
       totalRelapseTumorsMutatedOverRelapseTumorsInDataset
       diseaseFromSourceMappedId
       targetFromSourceId
       id
       score
      }
      }
    }
}

      }
      }
    }
}

query CNVDataQuery($ensemblId: String!, $efoId: String!, $size: Int!) {
  disease(efoId: $efoId) {
    id
    evidences(
      ensemblIds: [$ensemblId]
      enableIndirect: true
      size: $size
      datasourceIds: ["chop_putative_oncogene_fusion"]
    ) {
      count
      rows{
       breakpointLocation
       dataset
       Disease
       frequencyInOverallDataset
       frequencyInPrimaryTumors
       frequencyInRelapseTumors
       fusionName
       fusionType
       fusionAnno
       gene1AAnno
       gene1BAnno
       gene2AAnno
       gene2BAnno   
       genePosition
       geneSymbol
       kinaseDomainRetainedGene1A
       kinaseDomainRetainedGene1B
       MONDO
       PMTL
       reciprocalExistsEitherGeneKinase
       totalPrimaryTumorsMutatedOverPrimaryTumorsInDataset
       totalRelapseTumorsMutatedOverRelapseTumorsInDataset
       annots
diseaseFromSourceMappedId
targetFromSourceId
  id
  score
      }
      }
    }
}

query CNVDataQuery($ensemblId: String!, $efoId: String!, $size: Int!) {
  disease(efoId: $efoId) {
    id
    evidences(
      ensemblIds: [$ensemblId]

}

query SomaticMutationQuery($ensemblId: String!, $efoId: String!, $size: Int!) {
  SnvByGene:disease(efoId: $efoId) {
    id
    evidences(
      ensemblIds: [$ensemblId]
      enableIndirect: true
      size: $size
      datasourceIds: ["chop_gene_level_snv"]
    ) {
      count
      rows{
           dataset

           frequencyInOverallDataset

           frequencyInRelapseTumors
           geneFullName
           geneSymbol
           geneType
           MONDO

           OncoKBOncogeneTSG
           pedcbioPedotMutationsPlotURL
           pedcbioPedotOncoprintPlotURL
           proteinEnsemblId
           proteinRefseqId

           totalPrimaryTumorsMutatedOverPrimaryTumorsInDataset
           totalRelapseTumorsMutatedOverRelapseTumorsInDataset
           diseaseFromSourceMappedId
           targetFromSourceId
           id
           score
        }
    }
  }

  CnvByGene: disease(efoId: $efoId) {

            totalRelapseTumorsMutatedOverRelapseTumorsInDataset
            diseaseFromSourceMappedId
            targetFromSourceId
            id
            score
        }

    }

  Fusion : disease(efoId: $efoId) {
    id
    evidences(
      ensemblIds: [$ensemblId]

  SnvByVariant : disease(efoId: $efoId) {

       variantType

       diseaseFromSourceMappedId
       targetFromSourceId
       id
        score

    }
}

graphql.query:
query EpigeneticModificationQuery($ensemblId: String!, $size: Int) {
  target(ensemblId: $ensemblId) {
    id
    evidences(efoIds: [], size: $size, datasourceIds: ["chop_gene_level_methylation"]) {
      count
      rows {
        geneSymbol
        targetFromSourceId
        geneFeature
        dataset
        Disease
        diseaseFromSourceMappedId
        MONDO
        rnaCorrelation
        medianTPM
        probeID
        chromosome
        location
        betaQ1
        betaQ2
        betaMedian
        betaQ4
        betaQ5
      }
    }
  }
}

        geneSymbol
        targetFromSourceId
        transcriptId
        geneFeature
        dataset
        Disease
        diseaseFromSourceMappedId
        MONDO
        rnaCorrelation
        medianTPM
        transcriptRepresentation
        probeID
        chromosome
        location
        betaQ1
        betaQ2
        betaMedian
        betaQ4
        betaQ5
      }
    }
  }
}
